Pre-Game Insights: A Group C meeting between Denmark and Serbia, their third and final game in the 2024 UEFA European Championship group stage, kicks off at 3:00 PM ET on June 25 at Allianz Arena.
The three-way moneyline odds for this match are: Denmark (+130), draw (+220), Serbia (+235). The over/under for this match is 2.5 goals, with the over at +125 and the under at -155.
We are predicting Denmark to win, with a 43.5% chance of winning this match, based on the moneyline.
Denmark is 11th in the UEFA European Championship in goals scored (two overall, one per game), and Serbia is seventh in goals conceded (two overall, one per game).
In international matches the past two years, Denmark has scored 28 goals (1.8 per game) and Serbia has allowed 21 goals (1.2 per game).
With one goal in two matches, Serbia is 23rd in the UEFA European Championship. On the other hand, Denmark has conceded two goals in two matches, seventh in the competition.
In international matches the past two years, Serbia scored 26 goals (1.5 per game) and Denmark conceded 14 goals (0.9 per game).
Denmark and its opponents have each scored two goals in the UEFA European Championship, and its even goal differential is 11th in the tournament. (It was +14 the past two years.)
With one goal scored and two conceded, Serbia is 15th in the UEFA European Championship in goal differential. It was +5 the past two years.
